author: Vexed (@vexingvexed)
description: Do you ever forget to check for messages in a channel? This cog automatically pings a user/role when a message is sent in a channel.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores the channel ID and role/user ID for each channel that has a ping set. No other data is stored.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! Once you've loaded the cog, get started with `[p]autoping add`

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/autoping>
name: AutoPing
short: Automatically ping a user/role when a message is sent in a channel.
